channel.title: How do i change my crown?
channel.description: I'm an admin on my client but how do i change the crown i want to add my own tell me which files i should open

item.title: How do i change my crown?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Alright everyone, no offence, but your all stupid.
THERE IS NO ADMIN OR MOD ICONS IN YOUR SPRITES FOLDER.

If you want to know how to make your own, go to the “Client Hacking” board, and if you search around in there, you will find a tutorial on how to add custom crowns.
Although, its quite hard and is quite long…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change my crown?

item.title: How do i change my crown?
item.dc:creator: @K_Jay K Jay
item.description:
@K_Jay wrote:

Look open your client,then open ur sprites,look in ur sprites till u found ur crown right click on it,then click on edit,then a thing poppup how u want to edit it with photoshop ore paint.
Paint is good but i think you should use photoshop its better in graphics. And u can zoom in ever detail. So just edit it change colors change the size. Ur choise

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change my crown?
item.dc:creator: @mathew000000000 mathew000000000
item.description:
@mathew000000000 wrote:

lol thats client sided if you have your own client go into spirits and find the gold crown (admin crown)
open it in paint and make it to how you want it…

you cannot use the server to change the crown styl lol

p.s.
you cant rep either untill your rep is 15 lol
